name: COVID-19 Exterminator
description:
COVID-19 Exterminator is a free-to-play first-person shooter video game. Players can optionally donate funds to support the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. 

Donate now to a charity of your choice by using PayPal here. Your donation is optional.
https://www.paypal.com/fundraiser/113352600784545158#chooseCharities 

In the single player game, a player must find their way through a maze of bronchial tubes leading to chambers filled with alveoli–the small, balloon like anatomical structures in the lungs that are essential for breathing while battling an increasing number of endlessly spawning  COVID-19 viruses. The COVID-19 Exterminator is a “Donate what you wish to play” and free-to-play game.  Soon available for Mac OS!

Give us feedback here:

https://forms.gle/iVXtvRkT1QpsAkhE6
